name: Super Mario World Deluxe Maker (v2.1)
description:
Attention!

all assets are taken from the mario game series from Nintendo.
This is not the original game, but a fake. Thank you for your attention.

Controls!

Z - Jump

X - Running

Z+UP - Spin jump

Arrows - Walking

Space (in game) - stop level

Space (in editor) - open/close menu

Donationalerts: https://www.donationalerts.com/r/discomango
